title: Where can I buy authentic luxury watches online
selftext:
I am thinking of buying a Tissot watch.

I can find several websites for the watch but I am not sure about the authenticity of the sites.

After looking at the previous posts here, people have mentioned [https://www.ethoswatches.com](https://www.ethoswatches.com/) as a reliable website.

This is the watch to be exact \[[https://www.tissotwatches.com/en-in/t0639071605800.html](https://www.tissotwatches.com/en-in/t0639071605800.html)\] the official website also has a link to buy from TATA cliq store. I wanted to know if anyone has any experience shopping from there or would suggest some other places to buy from.

Regarding going to a physical store, I have a Helios store in my city but they only have a single piece which is up for display and has some scratches on it.
comments:
Ethos is as genuine as it gets, in fact it became a listed company on the stock exchange. 
WRT to Tata Cliq, probably it's a deal with Tata Cliq to link to their ecomm platform with the Swatch Group (Tissot is owned by them)
